Title: Erratic Artifacts
Description:
Dalaran housed many precious and powerful relics. Many of them were damaged in the crash and are now malfunctioning.

They must be destroyed!

Take this scroll. I have stored a shattering spell within it. Read the words aloud and its magic will be unleashed.

Report what you have done to Jaina when you are through. She will understand.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Jaina at the Tranquil Strand.
CompletionText: It pains me, but we have to destroy the malfunctioning relics!
RewardText:
Destroying more of Dalaran seems unconscionable.

But you and Aethas did the right thing.

They were unstable, and we could not risk their power being used against us.
